Wisdom: النَّفْسُ الْكَرِيمَةُ لَا تُؤَثِّرُ فِيهَا النَّكَبَاتُ
enWisdom: The noble soul is not affected by misfortunes

Wisdom: أَكْرِمْ نَفْسَكَ مَا أَعَانَتْكَ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Honour your soul as long as it aids you in the obedience of Allah
One who honours his [carnal] soul is abased by it

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَتْ نَفْسُهُ اسْتَهَانَ بِالْبَذْلِ وَالْإِسْعَافِ
enWisdom: One whose soul is noble finds it easy to give generously and help others

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَتْ عَلَيْهِ نَفْسُهُ لَمْ يُهِنْهَا بِالْمَعْصِيَةِ
enWisdom: One who considers his soul to be honourable does not abase it by sinning

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَتْ عَلَيْهِ نَفْسُهُ هَانَتْ عَلَيْهِ شَهْوَتُهُ
enWisdom: One who considers his soul to be honourable, his [lustful] desires become insignificant to him

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَتْ نَفْسُهُ قَلَّ شِقَاقُهُ وَخِلَافُهُ
enWisdom: One whose soul is honourable, his dissension and disagreement [with the people] is reduced

Wisdom: مَنْ كَرُمَتْ نَفْسُهُ صَغُرَتِ الدُّنْيَا فِي عَيْنِهِ
enWisdom: One whose soul is honourable, this world becomes insignificant in his eyes
